game.name: Chicken TD: Defenders of the Coop
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 창작마당, 통계, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Chicken TD is a unique tower defense game where you strategically summon and upgrade creature towers to defend your coop from waves of enemies, while also engaging in Souls-like melee combat with a chosen weapon to directly hold the line and collect meta-progression currency.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Chicken TD is a unique tower defense game where you strategically summon and upgrade creature towers to defend your coop from waves of enemies, while also engaging in Souls-like melee combat with a chosen weapon to directly hold the line and collect meta-progression currency.
